author: nathansamson
title: Networking events
description: Awareness of Cardano's projects and vision are very low on the ground here among investors, young people and community leaders in Ethiopia.
solution: Start a networking event and invite a prominent speaker to each event. These would become the first blockchain meetups in Addis Ababa.
experience: Manage and run various events in the hotel industry in Addis Ababa and helped promote events. Have experience as a digital marketer in Addis
